# Geriatrics Tools Sources

## Licensing Note
STOPP/START v3 is CC BY 4.0 and may be reused with attribution. Mini-Cog is free for clinical and educational use without permission. 4AT is freely available for clinical use.

## STOPP/START v3
- O'Mahony D, et al. Eur Geriatr Med 2023;14(4):625-632. (STOPP/START v3 update; 190 criteria total; CC BY 4.0).
- STOPP/START v3 Appendix 1 (Supplementary material) with the full criteria list.
- PubMed Central open access correction notes CC BY 4.0 license and criteria counts.

## 4AT
- Bellelli G, et al. Age and Ageing 2014;44(2):213-218. (4AT development and validation).
- 4AT official site user guide and scoring instructions.

## Mini-Cog
- Mini-Cog official site: scoring and interpretation guidance.
- Mini-Cog FAQ: free for clinical and educational use.
